importantArticles.headline: American Airlines Group (NasdaqGS:AAL) saw its share price decline by 11% over the past week, which may be linked to recent market stressors, including a downgrade from Jefferies affecting airline stocks like AAL due to concerns over consumer sentiment and economic uncertainty. The airline sector has been under pressure as a result of broader market volatility tied to potential U.S. tariff announcements projected to influence macroeconomic factors.
